title: Books of The Times: Review: ‘A Little Life,’ Hanya Yanagihara’s Traumatic Tale of Male Friendship
text:
Published By: NYTimes Books - Today 
This novel depicts a man whose mind and body are indelibly scarred by abuse, and the friends and professionals who struggle to help him....
